headline: Is It Time To Reassess IBM (IBM) After Its Recent Share Price Pullback?
summary: If you are wondering whether International Business Machines (IBM) still offers solid value at its current price, this article will walk you through what the numbers actually say about the stock. IBM last closed at US$237.54, with returns of an 8.9% decline over 7 days, a 19.8% decline over 30 days, and an 18.5% decline year to date, compared with a 4.8% decline over the past year, a 105.4% return over 3 years, and a 148.1% return over 5 years. Recent news coverage around IBM has focused on...
